code: export var validate=function validate(values){var errors={};var requiredFields=['fullName','email','subject','message'];requiredFields.forEach(function(field){if(!values[field]){errors[field]='Required';}});if(values.email&&!/^[A-Z0-9._%+-]+@[A-Z0-9.-]+\.[A-Z]{2,4}$/i.test(values.email)){errors.email='Invalid email address';}return errors;};
